oneOf.title: Apartment Rent
oneOf.description: An apartment that is listed for rent.

title.title: Title
title.description: Short description of the listed property. Used by many platforms as heading.
title.example: Wonderful new Home close to large Lake

address.title: Address
address.description: Geographic location of the property. Try to always pass all the information - if the street address should be published, just set the attribute 'publish' to 'true'.

externalId.title: External ID
externalId.description: ID that can be used to identify the property across different platforms. Might be visible to end users.

description.title: Description
description.description: Detailed general description of the listed property.
description.example: My first detailed description for a property.

furnishingDescription.title: Furnishing Description
furnishingDescription.description: Detailed description of the furnishing of the listed property.
furnishingDescription.example: My first furnishing description for a property.

locationDescription.title: Location Description
locationDescription.description: Detailed description of the location of the listed property.
locationDescription.example: My first location description for a property.

miscellaneousDescription.title: Miscellaneous Description
miscellaneousDescription.description: Detailed description of all the things that do not fit into the other description fields (eg. courtage comments).
miscellaneousDescription.example: My first misc description for a property.

floor.title: Floor
floor.description: Number of the floor the property is situated on.

hasLift.title: Lift
hasLift.description: Indicates if the property has a lift.

isAccessible.title: Accessible
isAccessible.description: Indicates if the property is accessible.

numberOfParkingSpaces.title: Number of Parking Spaces
numberOfParkingSpaces.description: Number of parking spaces that are available.

parkingSpaceRent.title: Parking Space Rent
parkingSpaceRent.description: Rent price of the parking spaces that are available.

parkingSpaceType.title: Parking Space Type
parkingSpaceType.description: Type of the parking spaces that are available.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition the property is in.
condition.$comment: Maybe add 'firstTimeUseAfterRefurbishment' to Switch so we can map it?

lastRefurbished.title: Last Refurbished
lastRefurbished.description: The year the property was last refurbished.
lastRefurbished.$comment: Is there a better way to do this? Like using a date field that accepts only a year but would also take a complete date?

interiorQuality.title: Interior Quality
interiorQuality.description: The quality of the interior of the property.

constructionYear.title: Construction Year
constructionYear.description: The year the property was constructed. If there is an energy certificate this should be filled out.
constructionYear.$comment: Is there a better way to do this?

availableFrom.title: Available From
availableFrom.description: From when the property will be available.

heatingType.title: Heating Type
heatingType.description: The type of the heating of the property.
heatingType.$comment: Not all potential options from Immoscout. Maybe add the other ones to Switch so we can map it?

energyCertificateStatus.title: Energy Certificate Status
energyCertificateStatus.description: Indicates the presence of an energy certificate. If `present`, `residentialEnergyCertificate` or `commercialEnergyCertificate` should be filled out (depending on the object type).

residentialEnergyCertificate.title: Energy Certificate for residential buildings
residentialEnergyCertificate.description: The residential energy certificate can be either a consumption or a need certificate. It can also be issued before or after 2014. It does not require a splitting between power and heat values, as non-residential certificates do.

type.description: Depending on this you must either supply `energyNeed` or `energyConsumption`.

prior2014.description: Set to `true` if the certificate was issued before May 1st, 2014.
prior2014.$comment: This is a field that could be deprecated in 2024 together with 'warmWaterIncluded'.

energySource.title: Energy Source
energySource.description: The energy source for the heating of the property.

energyNeed.description: The total energy that is needed (Endenergiebedarf). Required if `type` is set to `need`.

energyConsumption.description: The total energy that is consumed (Endenergieverbrauch). Required if `type` is set to `consumption`.

energyClass.description: The efficiency class of the certificate.

hasCellar.title: Cellar
hasCellar.description: Indicates if the property has a cellar.

numberOfFloors.title: Number of Floors
numberOfFloors.description: The number of floors the property has.

usableArea.title: Usable Area
usableArea.description: The area of the property that is usable according to DIN 277.

numberOfBedrooms.title: Number of Bedrooms
numberOfBedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms the property has.

numberOfBathrooms.title: Number of Bathrooms
numberOfBathrooms.description: The number of bathrooms the property has.

hasGuestToilet.title: Guest Toilet
hasGuestToilet.description: Indicates if the property has a guest toilet.

coldRent.title: Cold Rent
coldRent.description: The cold rent of the property.

warmRent.title: Warm Rent
warmRent.description: The warm rent of the property.

additionalCosts.title: Additional Costs
additionalCosts.description: The additional costs of the property.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.description: The deposit required for this property.

heatingCosts.title: Heating Costs
heatingCosts.description: The heating costs of the property.

warmRentIncludesHeatingCosts.title: Warm Rent includes Heating Costs
warmRentIncludesHeatingCosts.description: Indicates if the heating costs are included in the warm rent. Defaults to `true` if not given.

isSuitableAsSharedFlat.title: Shared Flat
isSuitableAsSharedFlat.description: Indicates if the property is suitable as shared flat.

livingArea.title: Living Area
livingArea.description: The living area of the property according to DIN 277.

numberOfRooms.title: Number of Rooms
numberOfRooms.description: The number of rooms the property has.
numberOfRooms.$comment: This is type `number` on purpose because listings can have attributes like `2.5 room apartment`.

hasBuiltInKitchen.title: Built In Kitchen
hasBuiltInKitchen.description: Indicates if the property has a built in kitchen. Usually for apartments.

hasBalcony.title: Balcony
hasBalcony.description: Indicates if the property has a balcony.

requiresWBS.title: WBS
requiresWBS.description: Indicates if the property requires a 'Wohnberechtigungsschein' (short 'WBS') - a certificate that declares the eligibility for subsidized living.

hasGarden.title: Garden
hasGarden.description: Indicates if the property has a garden.

commission.title: Commission
commission.description: The commission the property is marketed with. Leave out if there is no commission.

energyCertificateStatus.title: Energy Certificate Status
energyCertificateStatus.description: Indicates the presence of an energy certificate. If `present`, `residentialEnergyCertificate` or `commercialEnergyCertificate` should be filled out (depending on the object type).

commercialEnergyCertificate.title: Energy Certificate for commercial buildings
commercialEnergyCertificate.description: The commercial energy certificate can be either a consumption or a need certificate. It can also be issued before or after 2014. It requires a splitting between power and heat values.

type.description: Depending on this you must either supply `powerNeed` and `heatNeed` or `powerConsumption` and `heatConsumption`.

prior2014.description: Set to `true` if the certificate was issued before May 1st, 2014.
prior2014.$comment: This is a field that could be deprecated in 2024 together with 'warmWaterIncluded'.

energySource.title: Energy Source
energySource.description: The energy source for the heating of the property.

energyNeed.description: The total energy that is needed (Endenergiebedarf). Required if `type` is set to `need` and `prior2014` to `true`.

powerNeed.description: The power that is needed (Endenergiebedarf Strom). Required if `type` is set to `need` and `prior2014` to `false`.

heatNeed.description: The heat that is needed (Endenergiebedarf Wärme). Required if `type` is set to `need` and `prior2014` to `false`.

powerConsumption.description: The power that is consumed (Endenergieverbrauch Strom). Required if `type` is set to `consumption`.

heatConsumption.description: The heat that is consumed (Endenergieverbrauch Wärme). Required if `type` is set to `consumption`.

hasCellar.title: Cellar
hasCellar.description: Indicates if the property has a cellar.

numberOfFloors.title: Number of Floors
numberOfFloors.description: The number of floors the property has.

isListed.title: Listed
isListed.description: Indicates if the property is listed as protected historic building.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.description: The deposit required for this property.

usableArea.title: Usable Area
usableArea.description: The area of the property that is usable according to DIN 277.

totalArea.title: Total Area
totalArea.description: The total area of the property according to DIN 277.

hasAirConditioning.description: Indicates if the property has air conditioning.

hasKitchen.title: Kitchen
hasKitchen.description: Indicates if the property has a kitchen. Usually for commercial properties.

hasNetworkCables.title: Network Cables
hasNetworkCables.description: Indicates if the property has network cables installed.

address.description: Geographic location of the property. Try to always pass all the information - if the street address should be published, just set the attribute 'publish' to 'true'.

externalId.title: External ID
externalId.description: ID that can be used to identify the property across different platforms. Might be visible to end users.

description.title: Description
description.description: Detailed general description of the listed property.
description.example: My first detailed description for a property.

locationDescription.title: Location Description
locationDescription.description: Detailed description of the location of the listed property.
locationDescription.example: My first location description for a property.

miscellaneousDescription.title: Miscellaneous Description
miscellaneousDescription.description: Detailed description of all the things that do not fit into the other description fields (eg. courtage comments).
miscellaneousDescription.example: My first misc description for a property.

purchasePrice.title: Purchase Price
purchasePrice.description: The price offered to purchase the property.

purchasePriceOnRequest.title: Price on Request
purchasePriceOnRequest.description: Indicates if the price for the property is given only on request. If this field is set other fields like `purchasePrice` are ignored.

purchasePricePerSqm.title: Price per Squaremeter
purchasePricePerSqm.description: Indicates if the price for the property is given per squaremeter.

plotArea.title: Plot Area
plotArea.description: The plot area of the property according to DIN 277.

commission.title: Commission
commission.description: The commission the property is marketed with. Leave out if there is no commission.

availableFrom.title: Available From
availableFrom.description: From when the property will be available.

divisibleFrom.title: Divisible From
divisibleFrom.description: From this area on the property can be divided.
divisibleFrom.$comment: This is not the exact limit from Immoscout, but one digit below. We choose 9999999.99 instead of 99999999.4999

development.title: Development
development.description: Gives insight in how developed the property area is.

buildingRegulation.title: Building Regulation
buildingRegulation.description: The legal regulations that apply to the property.

siteCoverageIndex.title: Site Coverage Index
siteCoverageIndex.description: In German law 'Grundflächenzahl' according to §19 BauNVO. Defines on how much of the plot area one can build.

floorSpaceIndex.title: Floor Space Index
floorSpaceIndex.description: In German law 'Geschossflächenzahl' according to §20 BauNVO.

commercialPlotType.title: Commercial Plot Type
commercialPlotType.description: The type of the commercial plot.

oneOf.title: Other Commercial Rent
oneOf.description: A commercial property that is listed for rent and does not fit into a specific category.

locationDescription.description: Detailed description of the location of the listed property.

miscellaneousDescription.title: Miscellaneous Description
miscellaneousDescription.description: Detailed description of all the things that do not fit into the other description fields (eg. courtage comments).
miscellaneousDescription.example: My first misc description for a property.

rent.title: Rent
rent.description: The rent or lease of the property. For 'per sqm', 'on request' or 'per year' see other fields.

rentPerYear.title: Rent per Year
rentPerYear.description: Indicates if the given rent is for one year and not one month.

rentPerSqm.title: Rent per Sqm
rentPerSqm.description: Indicates if the given rent is for one squaremeter and not the whole property.

rentOnRequest.title: Rent on Request
rentOnRequest.description: Indicates if the rent is given only on request. If this field is set other fields like `rent` are ignored.

additionalCosts.title: Additional Costs
additionalCosts.description: The additional costs of the property.

commission.title: Commission
commission.description: The commission the property is marketed with. Leave out if there is no commission.

availableFrom.title: Available From
availableFrom.description: From when the property will be available.

plotArea.title: Plot Area
plotArea.description: The plot area of the property according to DIN 277.

totalArea.title: Total Area
totalArea.description: The total area of the property according to DIN 277.

usableArea.title: Usable Area
usableArea.description: The area of the property that is usable according to DIN 277.

divisibleFrom.title: Divisible From
divisibleFrom.description: From this area on the property can be divided.
divisibleFrom.$comment: This is not the exact limit from Immoscout, but one digit below. We choose 9999999.99 instead of 99999999.4999

isListed.title: Listed
isListed.description: Indicates if the property is listed as protected historic building.

hasLift.title: Lift
hasLift.description: Indicates if the property has a lift.

hasCellar.title: Cellar
hasCellar.description: Indicates if the property has a cellar.

flooringType.title: Flooring Type
flooringType.description: What kind of floor the property has.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.description: The deposit required for this property.

heatingType.title: Heating Type
heatingType.description: The type of the heating of the property.
heatingType.$comment: Not all potential options from Immoscout. Maybe add the other ones to Switch so we can map it?

energyCertificateStatus.title: Energy Certificate Status
energyCertificateStatus.description: Indicates the presence of an energy certificate. If `present`, `residentialEnergyCertificate` or `commercialEnergyCertificate` should be filled out (depending on the object type).

commercialEnergyCertificate.title: Energy Certificate for commercial buildings
commercialEnergyCertificate.description: The commercial energy certificate can be either a consumption or a need certificate. It can also be issued before or after 2014. It requires a splitting between power and heat values.

type.description: Depending on this you must either supply `powerNeed` and `heatNeed` or `powerConsumption` and `heatConsumption`.

prior2014.description: Set to `true` if the certificate was issued before May 1st, 2014.
prior2014.$comment: This is a field that could be deprecated in 2024 together with 'warmWaterIncluded'.

energySource.title: Energy Source
energySource.description: The energy source for the heating of the property.

energyNeed.description: The total energy that is needed (Endenergiebedarf). Required if `type` is set to `need` and `prior2014` to `true`.

powerNeed.description: The power that is needed (Endenergiebedarf Strom). Required if `type` is set to `need` and `prior2014` to `false`.

heatNeed.description: The heat that is needed (Endenergiebedarf Wärme). Required if `type` is set to `need` and `prior2014` to `false`.

powerConsumption.description: The power that is consumed (Endenergieverbrauch Strom). Required if `type` is set to `consumption`.

heatConsumption.description: The heat that is consumed (Endenergieverbrauch Wärme). Required if `type` is set to `consumption`.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition the property is in.
condition.$comment: Maybe add 'firstTimeUseAfterRefurbishment' to Switch so we can map it?

numberOfParkingSpaces.title: Number of Parking Spaces
numberOfParkingSpaces.description: Number of parking spaces that are available.

parkingSpaceRent.title: Parking Space Rent
parkingSpaceRent.description: Rent price of the parking spaces that are available.

parkingSpaceType.title: Parking Space Type
parkingSpaceType.description: Type of the parking spaces that are available.

lastRefurbished.title: Last Refurbished
lastRefurbished.description: The year the property was last refurbished.
lastRefurbished.$comment: Is there a better way to do this? Like using a date field that accepts only a year but would also take a complete date?

interiorQuality.title: Interior Quality
interiorQuality.description: The quality of the interior of the property.

constructionYear.title: Construction Year
constructionYear.description: The year the property was constructed. If there is an energy certificate this should be filled out.
constructionYear.$comment: Is there a better way to do this?

numberOfFloors.title: Number of Floors
numberOfFloors.description: The number of floors the property has.
